mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "All-Time Old Time Favorites", "All-Time Favorite Round Dances", "How to Learn Square Dance Calls, Part II", "Let's Give Them a Reason". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Help For Your Square Dance Club: Club Operation and a Club Paper", "Chuck Jones Note Book", "Ladies On the Square: Cake-Baker, or Show-Maker, Take Your Choice", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Drew Whitney", "Paging the Roundancers: Dot and "Date" Foster", "Style Series: Hand Hints", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
